thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com
thread.title: Patrick Lara

author: Patrick Lara
title: Patrick Lara
text: Brandon Williams of the New Braunfels location was super friendly and very helpful throughout the buying process. My wife and I were looking for a midsize SUV that was suitable for 7 passengers late last week and Brandon was leaving for the day but was a trooper and stayed late to help us out and review our options for different makes and models along with price range . I will definitely be referring my friends and family .. a big thanks to Brandon and the drive time management for getting me in and out with excellent service
